text: Philippe Léotard (his full name was Ange Philippe Paul André Léotard-Tomasi; 28 August 1940 - 25 August 2001) was a French actor, poet and singer. He died in Paris of leukemia on 25 August 2001, three days before his 61st birthday. == Other websites == * Category:1940 births Category:2001 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Nice Category:Deaths from leukemia
title: Philippe Léotard
